description:
Luffy amps up the reluctant Momonosuke, who is afraid of heights, in his giant pink dragon form, to fly and take him to Onigashima in the sky. Meanwhile, Yamato, in a hard battle against Kaido, vows to survive until Luffy returns.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Hishou! Hyakujuu e no Revenge
Luffy Soars! Revenge Against the King of the Beasts
Luffy dans les cieux. Match retour contre les Cent Bêtes !
Ruffy fliegt empor! – Die Revanche gegen die 100 Bestien
ルフィ飛翔! 百獣へのリベンジ
